Pre-Game Insights: The Lakers are 5-2 in conference matchups. Los Angeles is third in the Western Conference scoring 52.7 points per game in the paint led by Davis averaging 17.6.
Others: The Pelicans are 2-5 against Western Conference opponents. New Orleans is 1-7 in games decided by 10 points or more. The Lakers average 118.1 points per game, 3.8 more than the 114.0 the Pelicans give up to opponents.
